name: DEFEND THE PLANET (itch) (Xzealio)
description:
USE "A" AND "D" TO REPOSITION THE PLANETARY DEFENSE SHIELD, TO PROTECT FROM COMPLETE ANNIHILATION.

AS A PROUD MEMBER OF THE PLANETARY DEFENSE FORCE, IT IS YOUR DUTY TO KEEP THE PLANET SAFE.

EVERY TIME WE PROVE OUR WORTH TO THE PEOPLE OF THE PLANET, MORE FUNDING WILL COME FLOODING IN.
